title: Website design in Blackpool
metadescrip: Looking for a local website designer in Blackpool? Drop me a message to see how I can help your business
body_text: Hi, thank you for visiting my site, I'm Joe a freelance website designer based in Blackpool.
If you've arrived at this page you or your business is more than likely based just down the road, enjoying the sea air too :)

I have clients around the whole of the UK, even over seas in the US and Australia but having been born and bred in Blackpool and I like to make sure I'm giving back to my local community that has given me so much.
If your business is based in Blackpool (with an FY post code) I'd love to be able to help you out with getting your website refreshed with a locals discount.
Get in touch and get the kettle on and let's discuss how I can help your online presence.
